subSubSection.paragraph: Heterospilus spiloheterus Marsh sp. n. Figure 193

This species is very similar to Heterospilus sergeyi but is distinguished by the entirely granulate vertex.
The specific name is an anagram of Heterospilus .

caption.paragraph: Figure 193. Heterospilus spiloheterus Marsh, sp. n.: A-C paratype D-E holotype.
